categories.category: Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange

parameters.industry: Cosmetics, Soaps, Gels, Dairy Household chemicals, & Natural Oils
parameters.products:
Imperial Leather
, Soaps, Shampoos, Gels, Milk, Olive Oil, Detergents & Healthcare Products.

bdy.p:
PZ Cussons (
LSE
: PZC) is a large manufacturer of a wide variety of personal healthcare products, and consumer goods. It operates in a large number of countries in the third world, especially Africa and
Commonwealth nations. The company is listed on the
London Stock Exchange
and a constituent of the
FTSE 250 Index
.

sec.p:
PZ Cussons was founded in 1879 as a trading post in
Sierra Leone by George Paterson and George Zochonis as Paterson Zochonis.1 The Company expanded its operations into nearby
Nigeria before the end of the 19th century.1 PZ expanded considerably during the 20th century, acquiring factories and establishing offices in
Ghana and
Kenya .1 In 1975 the Company acquired Cussons Group (founded by
Thomas Cussons
).1 Later that century more offices and factories were acquired in
Asia
, with PZ's first factory built in
Thailand in 1986,1 and operations expanded into
Indonesia in 1988.1 In 1993 PZ bought the state-owned Pollena Wroclaw in
Poland ,1 followed in 1995 by Pollena Uroda1 and in 2002 Paterson Zochonis Plc was renamed PZ Cussons Plc.1
In 2008 PZ Cussons Plc acquired the Sanctuary Spa and Sanctuary products business.1

PZ Cussons Group has a presence in UK,
Poland ,
Greece ,
Nigeria ,
Ghana ,
Kenya ,
Indonesia ,
Thailand ,
Australia ,
Dubai ,
Malaysia and
India .2 Its biggest market is the
United Kingdom
.

PZ Cussons has factories in a number of countries, which include England, Poland, Thailand and Indonesia. PZ Cussons formerly had two English factories, but currently has only one. In 2005 PZ Cussons closed their
Nottingham factory (founded by
Gerard Bros. ), and relocated it to Thailand. In 2007 PZ Cussons plan to move their remaining English factory from
Kersal , Salford to
Swinton , Salford.

PZ Cussons' main brand is the
Imperial Leather
range of soaps, bath and shower and cosmetic products. It also produces Joy soaps, Cussons Kids toiletries, Premier soaps, Carex anti-bacterial moisturisers, Cussons baby lotions, Luksja gels and soaps, Makler perfumes, Pearl soaps, Sweet Seventeen teenage cosmetic products, Venus range of hair care products, Original Source shampoos and gels, Morning Fresh dishwash liquid, Florish Toothpaste, Elephant Extra Detergent, Radiant Laundry Granules, Robb mentholated rubs, Duck Laundry Soap and Minerva Olive Oils.

PZ Cussons formerly manufactured 1001 Carpet Cleaner. The brand was sold in 2004 to the American
WD-40
Company for £6.2 million.3.

PZ Cussons operates a joint venture electrical superstore in
Lagos , Nigeria and also operates in
Ghana .4

reflist.entry: Hall, W. 11.02.2004 “Weak dollar slows down PZ Cussons” Financial Times''

entry.weblink: Cussons boosted by strong trading in Nigeria
